medium: Lithographs on hand-made paper in linen portfolio
title: Study for "Forgiving", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
marks: chop mark, annotated in red graphite
description: Full length view of a man naked from the waist up; he faces forward in a chair with a lit cigarette in his PL hand; his legs turned slightly to the viewer\'s R; the words \"Forgiving\" inscribed, UC
